full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SGRUB THABS RIN CHEN 'BYUNG GNAS LAS GSUNG BA'I RGYUD SDE BZHI'I YI DAM GYI LHA TSOGS DAM BCA' CAN RNAMS KYI GZUNGS SNGAGS PHYOGS GCIG TU SGRIGS PA BZHUGS SO, ,

author_simple: TSANGS SRAS DGA' BA'I BLO GROS,
